content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase a simply modern crochet basket the color wheel uses timeless techniques to create a infinitely functional piece to reign in any chaos in a room the color wheel basket is soft and pliable while retaining enough structure to hold heavier items making this perfect for toys yarn blankets and even laundry skills chain stitch single_crochet increases magic_ring supplies mercerized cotton yarn or other cotton piping filler cord video tutorial https //youtu be/xn-pgoseqqa ……………………………………………………………………………… the pdf is beautifully formatted for easy printing and downloading it includes a complete materials list abbreviations and stitch definitions pattern notes with additional resources written instructions ……………………………………………………………………………… pattern is written in us crochet terms and available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link ……………………………………………………………………………… return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions ……………………………………………………………………………… thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
